short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Transform your Chrome with stunning live wallpapers of BMW M4, complete with search bar and quick-access site icons.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Get ready to elevate your browsing experience with the BMW M4 Pocket Chrome extension! Featuring dynamic live wallpapers of the legendary BMW M4, this extension brings the thrill of the race track to your screen every time you open a new tab. Whether you're a die-hard BMW fan or simply appreciate the beauty of high-performance cars, this extension is designed to impress.

The BMW M4 Pocket extension also comes with a fully integrated Google search bar for quick and easy browsing, right within your customized tab. Plus, youâ€™ll find convenient quick-access icons for your favorite sites, keeping everything you need just a click away.

With the BMW M4's sleek design and live wallpapers that shift as you browse, your Chrome will never look the same again. Perfect for car enthusiasts and BMW lovers alike, this extension brings energy and style to your everyday online routine.
